chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Storm Gathers
chapters.info: Uno Nomesta, p. 174 (236)—A Shienaran officer who accompanied the Emond's Fielders away from Shienar. He is the one who gave orders to Masema in the past. He is missing one eye, has a long scar across his face, and has a hairstyle like the typical Shienaran warrior—a topknot tied together and the rest of the head shaved clean. He is currently in Salidar with Nynaeve and Elayne.
